description: Increases the effect of the actor's enchanted bolt special effects.
The prime example is the passive effect of Zaryte Crossbow, which increases this value by 10%
The value of this bonus is 0 by default, and increases by 0.01 for each one percent.
Increases the proc chance of the actor's enchanted bolt special effects.
Armadyl crossbow increases the base chance by 100%, hence the value for it would be 1.
Rather than modifying the proc chance of enchanted bolts, this bonus overrides it.
Zaryte crossbow guarantees an enchanted bolt proc, so its value would be 1.
By default, an actor's special attack energy recharges once every 30 seconds.
This bonus overrides this value by a number in seconds.
E.g. the Lightbearer modifies this value to 15 seconds.
By default, an actor's special attack energy recharges by 10% whenever the timer cycles.
This bonus overrides this value by a number in percent.
